revised_title: British Colonial Magnetic Observatories: Determining Absolute Values, Secular Change, and Annual Variation of the Magnetic Force
tldr: The author discusses the challenges faced in determining the absolute values, secular changes, and annual variations of the magnetic force using British Colonial Magnetic Observatories. They describe the modifications made to the Portable Magnetometer and the improvements in the methods of observation to overcome these challenges. The author also highlights the potential for further advancements in understanding terrestrial magnetism.
